eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the:

nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
nso: TSHEPETŠO YA LETŠATŠI:

eng: Debate on National Women’s Day: Generation Equality – Realising women’s rights for an equal future.
nso: Ngangišano ka Letšatši la Bosetšhaba la Basadi: Tekatekano ya Moloko wa go Fapana – Go lemoga ditokelo tša basadi gore ba be le bokamoso bja go lekalekana.

eng: Debate in terms of Rule 130: Solidarity with the #BlackLivesMatter movement – Reinforcing the commitment of all South Africans to confront and defeat individual and institutional racism in our society and everywhere else it exists – (Mr N F Shivambu).
nso: Ngangišano go ya ka Molawana wa 130: Go ema le mokgatlo wa #BlackLivesMatter – Go tiišetša boikgafo bja MaAfrika Borwa ka moka go itebanya le go fenya semorafe sa motho ka bonoši le sehlongwa sethabeng sa gaborena le kae le kae moo se lego gona – (Mna N F Shivambu).

nso: TŠWETŠOPELE YA MORERO

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Jamestown, go la Stellenbosch, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka phetišetšo ya taolo ya maatla a motlagase ka Eskom go neteweke ya motlagase go Jamestown go ya go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng ka la 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka 26 Mei 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Thušo ya tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Jamestown, go la Stellenbosch, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka phetišetšo ya taolo ya maatla a motlagase ka Eskom go neteweke ya motlagase go Jamestown go ya go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
nso: MELAOKAKANYWA YEO E IŠITŠWEGO GO LEANO LA TLHOPHO LA MOHLAKANELWA (JTM)

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Jamestown, go la Stellenbosch, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka phetišetšo ya taolo ya maatla a motlagase ka Eskom go neteweke ya motlagase go Jamestown go ya go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Bona letl 309 (Mna Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020).

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House, notwithstanding Rule 139(1), which deals with questions for oral reply in respect of the Deputy President, permits that replies in respect of oral questions that were due to be given on 20 August 2020, be submitted in writing as agreed by the National Assembly Programme Committee.
nso: Sephethokakanywa (Sefepisegolo sa Lekgotlabontši): Gore Ngwako, go sa lebelelwe Molao wa 139(1), wo o šomago ka dipotšišo tša go fetolwa ka sebele mabapi le Motlatša Mopresidente, o dumelele gore diphetolo mabapi le dipotšišo tša go fetolwa ka sebele tšeo di bego di letetšwe ka di 20 Agostose 2020, di hlagišwe ka tsela ya go ngwalwa ka ge go dumelelanwe le Komitit ya Lenaneo la Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba.

nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020 – reported on 29 July 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020 – e begilwe ka di 29 Julae 2020)).

nso: DIPOTŠIŠO:

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene ya go tšwa baduding ba Germiston, mmasepaleng wa toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, e kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša mathata a go tima ga motlagase kgafetšakgafetša (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene ya go tšwa baduding ba Boksburg, mmasepaleng wa toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, e kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša mathata a go tima ga motlagase kgafetšakgafetša (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kempton Park, ba kgopela Kopano go nyakišiša palo ya tlase yeo e phelago e le bjalo ya ponagalo ya maphodisa le tlhaelelo ya difatanaga setešeng sa maphodisa sa Kempton Park (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Alberton ba kgopela gore Ngwako o nyakišiše ka botšeakarolo bja setšhaba le tatelo ya molao go hlabolla ya kago yeo e šišintšwego ya mengwako kua Alberton (Mna D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Wattville, go la Benoni ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e rarolle bosenyi bjo bo gaketšego, go akaretšwa dikgaruru tša go amana le bong gammogo le dikgaruru kgahlanong le bana, le nyakego ya seteše sa maphodisa tikologong ya bona (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Ngwako gore o nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya bosenyi le diokobatši, kabo ya mengwakwana yeo maphodisa a tlago šomela ka go yona le dikoloi tšeo ba tlago di šomiša tikologong ya bona (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Bredell, Pomona, go la Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate ya 25), Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go phuhlama ga kabo ya go kgodiša ya motlagase ditikologong tša bona (Mdi H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E feteditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E feteditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišano-mmogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Extradition (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Bangladesh ka ga Pušetšo ya Motho Nageng ye a Dirilego Molato (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka la 18 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka la 3 tša Matšhe – ya fetišwa ka di 10 Matšhe 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 30 Janaware 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the Republic of Bangladesh on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 18 November 2019 – reported on 3 March 2020 - approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 30 January 2020 – reported on 17 March 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Rephabliki ya Bangladesh ka ga Thušo ka tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 18 Nofemere 2019 – ya begwa ka di 3 Matšhe 2020 – ya fetišwa ka di 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E feteditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 30 Janaware: 2020.

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomo ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2020.)

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States Thušo ka tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020).

nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020).

nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka ga Ditsebišo tšeo di laetšago putseletšo ya Mošireletši wa Setšhaba le Bakhomišenare ba Khomišene ya Afrika Borwa ya Ditokelo tša Botho go tloga ka la 1 Aporele 2019 (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 22 June 2020, letl 15).
