nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo ka ga ketelo ya tekodišišo ya Dikarolo tša Thuto tša Capricorn le Sekhukhune, Profenseng ya Limpopo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 26 Febereware 2020, letl 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo ka Tšhišinyo go tšwa go Batho ba Bohwa bja Griqua ka tlhokego ya Sekolo sa Phoraemari (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Febereware 2020, letl 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Mohlakanelwa ya Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Palamente ka Mošomo wa Kotara ya Mathomo ya 2019/20 wa Palamente ya Rephabliki ya Afrika (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 9 Disemere 2019, letl 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Mohlakanelwa ya Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Palamente ka Pego ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya 2019/20 ya Palamente ya Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 9 Disemere 2019, letl 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo, tša Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 2018/19 Dipego tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Sekhwama sa Bosetšhaba sa Tlhabollo ya Mabokgoni le Lekala la Thuto le Balaodi ba Tlhahlo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Kgwebo le Intasteri ka Mošomo wa Kotara ya Bobedi ya ngwaga ditšhelete wa 2019/20 wa Dikgoro tša Kgwebo le Intasteri le ya Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi le tšeo e se go tša ditšhelete (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Molekodi-Pharephare ka Pego yeo e Kopakopanego ya Ngwaga ya Molekodi-Pharephare ngwageng wa ditšhelete wa 2018/19 (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 4 Disemere 2019, letl 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene ya go tšwa baduding ba Germiston, mmasepaleng wa toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, e kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša mathata a go tima ga motlagase kgafetšakgafetša (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene ya go tšwa baduding ba Boksburg, mmasepaleng wa toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, e kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša mathata a go tima ga motlagase kgafetšakgafetša (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kempton Park, ba kgopela Kopano go nyakišiša palo ya tlase yeo e phelago e le bjalo ya ponagalo ya maphodisa le tlhaelelo ya difatanaga setešeng sa maphodisa sa Kempton Park (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Alberton ba kgopela gore Ngwako o nyakišiše ka botšeakarolo bja setšhaba le tatelo ya molao go hlabolla ya kago yeo e šišintšwego ya mengwako kua Alberton (Mna D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Wattville, go la Benoni ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e rarolle bosenyi bjo bo gaketšego, go akaretšwa dikgaruru tša go amana le bong gammogo le dikgaruru kgahlanong le bana, le nyakego ya seteše sa maphodisa tikologong ya bona (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Ngwako gore o nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya bosenyi le diokobatši, kabo ya mengwakwana yeo maphodisa a tlago šomela ka go yona le dikoloi tšeo ba tlago di šomiša tikologong ya bona (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Wate ya 37, go la Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go dula mo go sego molaong seteneng sa 1/1224 nomoro ya 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mna D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo le Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E feteditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E feteditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka 26 Mei 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišano-mmogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States Thušo ka tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020).

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:
nso: TSHEPEDIŠO YA LETŠATŠI:

eng: Debate on Youth Day: Youth Power – Growing South Africa together in a time of Covid-19.
nso: Ngangišano ya Letšatši la Baswa: Maatla a Baswa – Go godiša Afrika Borwa mmogo ka nako ya Covid-19.

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on Provisional suspension from office of Mr L T Mkansi, a Regional Magistrate, Bloemfontein, tabled in terms of section 13(3)(b) of Magistrates Act, 1993 (Act No 90 of 1993)  (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 4).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka Pego ya fegwa ga nakwana ga ofisi ga Mna L T Mkansi, Mmaseterata wa Selete wa Bloemfontein, o adilwe tafoleng go ya ka karolo ya 13(3)(b) Molao wa Mmaseterata, wa 1993 (Molao wa 90 wa 1993) (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 29 Mei 2020, letl 4).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 June 2020, p 2).
nso: Keleletšo ya Kgopelo ya Phetišo ka Palamente ya Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia go ya ka karolo 231(2) ya Molaotheo, 1996 (Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano, bona Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 June 2020, letl 2).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 4).
nso: Keleletšo ya Kgopelo ya phetišo ya Palamente ka Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Kwano ya Thušo ya tša molao mabapi le Merero ya Bosenyi go ya ka karolo ya 231(2) ya Molaotheo, wa 1996 (Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo, bona Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 29 Mei 2020, letl 4).

eng: Consideration of Request for Approval by Parliament of Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition in terms of section 231(2) of Constitution, 1996 (Report of Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services, see Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 29 May 2020, p 3).
nso: Keleletšo ya Kgopelo ya phetišo ka Palamente ya magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšo ya Motho Nageng ye a Dirilego Molato go ya ka karolo ya 231(2) ya Molaotheo, wa 1996 (Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo, bona Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 29 Mei 2020, letl 3).

eng: FURTHER BUSINESS
nso: TŠWETŠOPELE YA MORERO

eng: ORDERS OF THE DAY:

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Third Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcement, Tablings and Committee Reports, 19 May 2020, p 3).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Kgwebo le Intasteri ka ga Phethagatšo ya Kotara ya Boraro ya ngwaga wa Ditšhelete wa 2019/20 le Phethagatšo ya go se ame Ditšhelete tša Kgoro ya Kgwebo le Intasteri le Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 19 Mei 2020, letl 3).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on Oversight visit on pilot project for acquisition of office accommodation for South African Permanent Mission to United Nations and Consulate-General in New York, United States of America (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 16 March 2020, p 11).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka ga Ketelo ya Tekodišišo go phorotšeke ya phaelote go rekela ofisi ya Boromiwa bja Sammaruri ya Ditšhaba tšeo di Kopanego le Mokhontshulara-Pharephare go la New York, kua United States of America (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 16 Matšhe 2020, letl 11).

eng: Decision of Question on Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
nso: Sephetho sa Potšišo ka Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo, tša Mahlale le Theknolotši ka ga pego ya phethagatšo ya Kotara ya Pele ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019/20 le kabo ya ditirelo ya Kgoro ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo le Tlhahlo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department Public Service and Administration, Entities and Public Service Commission (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 30).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Statistics South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 23).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le Taolo ka Phethagatšo ya kotara ya Bobedi le ya Boraro ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019/20: Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Matšhe 2020, letl 23).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation and Brand South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 15).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le Taolo ka ga Phethagatšo ya kotara ya Bobedi le ya Boraro ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019/20: Kgoro ya Togamaano, Tlhokomedišišo le Tekodišišo ya Brand South Africa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Matšhe 2020, letl 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Petition from the residents of Dryharts village, calling on the Assembly to investigate the re-opening of the Molehabangwe Middle School, submitted by Mr I S Seitlholo, MP (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 38).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo ya Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba motseng wa Dryharts, ba kgopela Ngwako go dira dinyakišišo ka ga pulo-leswa ya Sekolo sa Magareng sa Molehabangwe, yeo e hlagišitšwego ke Mna I S Seitlholo, LP (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 26 Febereware 2020, letl 38).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on oversight visit to Capricorn and Sekhukhune Education Districts, Limpopo Province (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 6).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo ka ga ketelo ya tekodišišo ya Dikarolo tša Thuto tša Capricorn le Sekhukhune, Profenseng ya Limpopo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 26 Febereware 2020, letl 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo ka Tšhišinyo go tšwa go Batho ba Bohwa bja Griqua ka tlhokego ya Sekolo sa Phoraemari (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Febereware 2020, letl 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Mohlakanelwa ya Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Palamente ka Mošomo wa Kotara ya Mathomo ya 2019/20 wa Palamente ya Rephabliki ya Afrika (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 9 Disemere 2019, letl 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Mohlakanelwa ya Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Palamente ka Pego ya ngwaga ka ngwaga ya 2019/20 ya Palamente ya Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 9 Disemere 2019, letl 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2018/19 Annual Reports of National Skills Fund and Sector Education and Training Authorities (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 24).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo, tša Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 2018/19 Dipego tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Sekhwama sa Bosetšhaba sa Tlhabollo ya Mabokgoni le Lekala la Thuto le Balaodi ba Tlhahlo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Kgwebo le Intasteri ka Mošomo wa Kotara ya Bobedi ya ngwaga ditšhelete wa 2019/20 wa Dikgoro tša Kgwebo le Intasteri le ya Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi le tšeo e se go tša ditšhelete (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Molekodi-Pharephare ka Pego yeo e Kopakopanego ya Ngwaga ya Molekodi-Pharephare ngwageng wa ditšhelete wa 2018/19 (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 4 Disemere 2019, letl 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene ya go tšwa baduding ba Germiston, mmasepaleng wa toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, e kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša mathata a go tima ga motlagase kgafetšakgafetša (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Boksburg, Ekurhuleni metropolitan municipality, calling on the Assembly to investigate the numerous power outages (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene ya go tšwa baduding ba Boksburg, mmasepaleng wa toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, e kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša mathata a go tima ga motlagase kgafetšakgafetša (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kempton Park, calling on the Assembly to investigate chronic inadequate visible policing and shortage of vehicles at the Kempton Park police station (Mr M Waters) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kempton Park, ba kgopela Kopano go nyakišiša palo ya tlase yeo e phelago e le bjalo ya ponagalo ya maphodisa le tlhaelelo ya difatanaga setešeng sa maphodisa sa Kempton Park (Mna M Waters) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Alberton, calling on the Assembly to investigate public participation and legislative compliance in the proposed housing development in Alberton (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Alberton ba kgopela gore Ngwako o nyakišiše ka botšeakarolo bja setšhaba le tatelo ya molao go hlabolla ya kago yeo e šišintšwego ya mengwako kua Alberton (Mna D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušo-Tirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Wattville, Benoni calling on the Assembly to address the escalation of crime, including gender-based violence and violence against children, and the need for a police station in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Wattville, go la Benoni ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e rarolle bosenyi bjo bo gaketšego, go akaretšwa dikgaruru tša go amana le bong gammogo le dikgaruru kgahlanong le bana, le nyakego ya seteše sa maphodisa tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high crime rate and drugs, the provision of police kiosks and police vehicles in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Ngwako gore o nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya bosenyi le diokobatši, kabo ya mengwakwana yeo maphodisa a tlago šomela ka go yona le dikoloi tšeo ba tlago di šomiša tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Moh I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Ward 37, Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the illegal occupation of stand 1/1224 number 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mr D Bergman) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs and Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Wate ya 37, go la Alberton North, Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go dula mo go sego molaong seteneng sa 1/1224 nomoro ya 42, Second Avenue, Alberton North (Mna D Bergman) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo le Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E feteditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E feteditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka 26 Mei 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišano-mmogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States Thušo ka tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020).

eng: MOTIONS:
nso: DITŠHIŠINYO:

eng: Draft resolution (Chief Whip of the Majority Party): That the House suspends Rule 290(2)(a), which provides inter alia that the debate on the Second Reading of the Bill may not commence before at least three Assembly working days have elapsed since the committee’s report was tabled, for the purposes of conducting the Second Reading today on the Adjustments Appropriation Bill [B 10B - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 77).
nso: Sephethokakanywa (Sefepisegolo sa Lekgotlabontši): Gore Ngwako o fege Molao wa 290(2)(a), wo o fanago, gare ga tše dingwe, ka gore ngangišano ya Palo ya Bobedi ya Molaokakanywaphetošo e se ke ya thongwa le ge e ka ba pele ga ge matšatši a mararo a ge Kopanokgolo ya boraro e fedile go tloga ge pego ya Komiti e adilwe, morerong wa go phethagatša Palo ya Bobedi lehono ka ga Molaokakanywaphetošo wa Karologanyo ya Matlotlo [B 10B - 2020] (National Assembly – sec 77).

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Jamestown, go la Stellenbosch, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka phetišetšo ya taolo ya maatla a motlagase ka Eskom go neteweke ya motlagase go Jamestown go ya go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng ka la 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka 26 Mei 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Thušo ya tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020).).

nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo, tša Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 2018/19 Dipego tša Ngwaga ka Ngwaga tša Sekhwama sa Bosetšhaba sa Tlhabollo ya Mabokgoni le Lekala la Thuto le Balaodi ba Tlhahlo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 24).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Trade and Industry on Departments of Trade and Industry and of Economic Development’s Second Quarter Financial and Non-financial Performance for 2019/20 financial year (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 4).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Kgwebo le Intasteri ka Mošomo wa Kotara ya Bobedi ya ngwaga ditšhelete wa 2019/20 wa Dikgoro tša Kgwebo le Intasteri le ya Tlhabollo ya Ekonomi le tšeo e se go tša ditšhelete (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 4).

eng: Consideration of Report of Standing Committee on Auditor-General on Integrated Annual Report of Auditor-General for financial year 2018/19 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 4 December 2019, p 3).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Molekodi-Pharephare ka Pego yeo e Kopantšwego ya Ngwaga ya Molekodi-Pharephare ngwageng wa ditšhelete wa 2018/19 (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 4 Disemere 2019, letl 3).

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Jamestown, go la Stellenbosch, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka phetišetšo ya taolo ya maatla a motlagase ka Eskom go neteweke ya motlagase go Jamestown go ya go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
nso: MELAOKAKANYWA YEO E IŠITŠWEGO GO LEANO LA TLHOPHO LA MOHLAKANELWA (JTM)

nso: Molaokakanywaphetošo wa Tekatekano ya Mešomo l [B 14 - 2020] (Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba – kar yeo e akantšwego ya 75).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng ka la 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka 26 Mei 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Thušo ya tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020).

nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka Ketelo ya Tekodišišo go phorotšeke ya phaelote go rekela ofisi ya Boromiwa bja Sammaruri ya Ditšhaba tšeo di Kopanego le Mokhontshulara-Pharephare go la New York, kua United States of America (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 16 Matšhe 2020, letl 11).

eng: Decision of Question on Report of Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 2019/20 First Quarter financial and service delivery performance report of Department of Higher Education and Training (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 5 December 2019, p 64).
nso: Sephetho sa Potšišo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo, tša Mahlale le Theknolotši ka pego ya phethagatšo ya 2019/20 wa ditšhelete tša Kotara ya Mathomo le kabo ya ditirelo ya Kgoro ya Thuto ya Maemo a Godimo le Tlhahlo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 5 Disemere 2019, letl 64).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department Public Service and Administration, Entities and Public Service Commission (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 30).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le Taolo ka ga Phethagatšo ya kotara ya Bobedi le ya Boraro ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019/20: Kgoro ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le Taolo, Dihlongwa le Khomišene ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Matšhe 2020, letl 30).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Statistics South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 23).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le Taolo ka ga phethagatšo ya Kotara ya Bobedi le ya Boraro ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019/20: Dipalopalo tša Afrika Borwa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Matšhe 2020, letl 23).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee Public Service and Administration on Second and Third quarter performance of 2019/20 financial year: Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation and Brand South Africa (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 March 2020, p 15).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Ditirelo tša Setšhaba le Taolo ka ga phethagatšo ya kotara ya Bobedi le ya Boraro ya ngwaga wa ditšhelete wa 2019/20: Kgoro ya Togamaano, Tlhokomedišišo le Tekodišišo le Brand South Africa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 11 Matšhe 2020, letl 15).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on oversight visit to Capricorn and Sekhukhune Education Districts, Limpopo Province (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 26 February 2020, p 6).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Motheo ka ga ketelo ya tekodišišo ya Dikarolo tša Thuto tša Capricorn le Sekhukhune, Profenseng ya Limpopo (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 26 Febereware 2020, letl 6).

eng: Consideration of Report of Portfolio Committee on Basic Education on Submission from the Griqua People’s Heritage on the lack of a Primary School (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 11 February 2020, p 5).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s performance in first quarter of 2019/20 (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 20).

eng: Consideration of Report of Joint Standing Committee on Financial Management of Parliament on Parliament of Republic of South Africa’s 2018/19 Annual Report (Announcements, Tablings and Committee Reports, 9 December 2019, p 5).
nso: Keleletšo ya Pego ya Komiti ya Sammaruri ya Mohlakanelwa ya Taolo ya Ditšhelete tša Palamente ka Pego ya Ngwaga ka Ngwaga ya 2018/19 ya Palamente ya Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa (Ditsebišo, Tšeo di Adilwego Tafoleng le Dipego tša Dikomiti, 9 Disemere 2019, letl 5).

eng: APPENDIXES
nso: DIMAMATLETŠO

eng: PETITIONS REFERRED TO COMMITTEES
nso: DIPHETHIŠENE TŠEO DI IŠITŠWEGO DIKOMITING

eng: Petition from the residents of the City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the chronic inadequate refuse removal services in their area (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropokgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ditirelo tša go tlošwa ga matlakala mo go sa phethagalago ga lebaka le le telele tikologong ya bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Kokomeng le metseng ya baagišane, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša le go šetša kudu pulo leswa ya seteišene sa maphodisa sa Kokomeng (Mna I S Seitlholo) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Sephodisa – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Pethišene go tšwa baduding ba Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park le Glen Marais (wate 25), Toropkgolo ya Ekurhuleni, ba kgopela Ngwako go nyakišiša phuhlamo ya mothopo wa go botega wa motlagase mafelong a bona (Moh H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Actonville, go la Benoni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka kelo ya godimo ya tefelo ya rente ka bahiri ba difolete tšeo e lego tša khantshele (Mna H Ismail) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Bodudi bja Batho, Meetse le Kelelatšhila – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Jamestown, go la Stellenbosch, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka phetišetšo ya taolo ya maatla a motlagase ka Eskom go neteweke ya motlagase go Jamestown go ya go mmasepala wa Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises - National Assembly).
nso: Phethišene go tšwa go badudi ba Germiston, go la Ekurhuleni, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase go la Germiston (Mdi M Clarke) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikgwebo tša Setšhaba - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go badudi ba Toropo ya Letsitele, Wateng ya 23, Tzaneen, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e kgonthišiše gore mmasepala wa Tzaneen o obamela melao, melawana ya mmasepala, le melawana, le gore o phethagatša lefelo la tikologo leo le šupeditšwego leo le kgonegago, le go lekola le go emiša ditiro tšeo di se go molaong (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotirišano le Merero ya Setšo - Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nso: Phetišene go tšwa go balemi le setšhaba sa Tzaneen, go la Limpopo, ba emetšwe ke AGRI Letaba, ba dira boipiletšo go Kopano gore e nyakišiše ka go kgaogakgaoga ga motlagase ka tsela ye mpe, go imelwa ga motlagase, dibolethetše tša tlase le go lokišwa ga ona motlagase ga tlase go tloga ngwageng wa 2016 ka lebaka la go palelwa ga Mmasepala wa Greater Tzaneen (Mdi D van der Walt) – (Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Pušotiršiano le Merero ya Setšo – Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba).

eng: BILLS REFERRED TO JOINT TAGGING MECHANISM (JTM)
nso: MELAOKAKANYWA YEO E IŠITŠWEGO GO LEANO LA TLHOPHO LA MOHLAKANELWA (JTM)

nso: Molaokakanywaphetošo wa Tekatekano ya Mešomo [B 14 - 2020] (Ngwako wa Bosetšhaba – kar yeo e akantšwego ya 75).

eng: INTERNATIONAL AGREEMENTS
nso: DIKWANO TŠA BODITŠHABATŠHABA

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) on the Establishment of an International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology (ICGEB) Component in the Republic of South Africa (Tabled on 18 September 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Higher Education, Science and Technology on 19 September 2019 - reported on 5 December 2019 – approved on 10 March 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Education and Technology, Sports, Arts and Culture on 19 November 2019 – reported on 26 May 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) ka ga Tlhamo ya Senthara ya Boditšhabatšhaba la Boentšineere bja tša Ditšini le Paotheknolotši (ICGEB) Rephabliking ya Afrika Borwa (Ya alwa tafoleng ka la 18 Setemere 2019) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Thuto ya Godimo, Mahlale le Theknolotši ka 19 Setemere 2019- e begilwe ka 5 Disemere 2019- ya fetišwa ka la 10 Matšhe) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya Thuto le Theknolotši, Dipapadi, Bokgabo le Setšo ka la 19 Nofemere 2019 – e begilwe ka 26 Mei 2020).

eng: Ratification of the Agreement between the Government of the Republic of India, the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil and the Government of the Republic of South Africa on the IBSA Fund for the Alleviation of Poverty and Hunger (signed 17 October 2017) (Tabled on 18 October 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 22 October 2019) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 24 October 2019).
nso: Tiišetšo ya Tumelelano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya India, Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Feterale ya Brazil le Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa ka ga Sekhwama sa IBSA sa Phetšišo ya Bohloki le Tlala (yeo e saennwego 17 Oktobere 2017) (Ya alwa tafoleng 18 Oktobere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšba le Tšhomišanommogo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ka la 22 Oktobere 2019) (NCOP: E šupeditšwe go Komiti ye e Kgethilwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka 24 Oktobere 2019).

eng: Agreement between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the European Atomic Energy Community (EURATOM) for Co-operation in the Peaceful Uses of Nuclear Energy (Tabled on 14 November 2019) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Mineral Resources and Energy on 18 November 2019).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Setšhaba sa Enetši ya Athomi ya Yuropa (EURATOM) go Hlola Tirišano Tirišong ya Enetši ya Nyuklea ka Khutšo (E adilwe ka 14 Nofemere 2019). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Didirišwa tša Dimirale le Enetši ka la 18 Nofemere 2019).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Thušo ya tša Molao Dinageng tše Mabapi le Merero ya tša Bosenyi (E adilwe ka di 5 tša Matšhe 2020). (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Toka le Tšhireletšo ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: Treaty between the Government of the Republic of South Africa and the Government of the United Mexican States on Extradition (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Justice and Correctional Services on 9 March 2020 – reported on 29 May 202 0– approved on 17 June 2020) (NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 10 March 2020 – reported on 1 June 2020).
nso: Kwano magareng ga Mmušo wa Rephabliki ya Afrika Borwa le Mmušo wa United Mexican States ka Pušetšomorago (E adilwe ka di 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya tša Toka le Ditirelo tša Tshokollo ka di 9 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 29 Mei 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Hlaotšwego ya tša Tšhireletšo le Toka ka la 10 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe 1 June 2020).

eng: African Charter on Statistics (Tabled on 5 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on Public Service and Administration on 9 March 2020).
nso: Tšhatha ya Afrika ya Dipalopalo (E adilwe ka la 5 Matšhe 2020) (NA: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Taolo le Ditirelo tša Setšhaba ka la 9 Matšhe 2020).

eng: Treaty of Amity and Cooperation (TAC) in South East Asia (Tabled on 18 March 2020) (NA: Referred to Portfolio Committee on International Relations and Cooperation on 26 March 2020 – reported on 11 June 2020 – approved on 17 June 2020)(NCOP: Referred to Select Committee on Security and Justice on 29 June 2020).
nso: Kwano ya Dikamano tša Segwera le Tirišano (TAC) go la Borwa Bohlabela bja Asia (E adilwe tafoleng ka la 18 Matšhe 2020) (NA: O išitšwe go Komiti ya Phothefolio ya Dikamano tša Boditšhabatšhaba le Tirišano ka la 26 Matšhe 2020 – e begilwe ka 11 June 2020 - e fetišitšwe ka 17 June 2020) (NCOP: E fetišeditšwe go Komiti yeo e Ikgethilego ya Tšhireletšo le Toka ka di 29 June 2020).

nso: SETATAMENTE SA TONA:

nso: Setatamente sa Tona ya Tlhabollo ya tša Seleago mabapi le ditsenogare tša go thuša mo maiming ao a hlotšwego ke bolwetši ba lefase ka bophara bja Covid-19.
